010package imagingbook.common.threshold.global;
011
012/**
013 * Minimum Error thresholder after Kittler and Illingworth (1986).
014 * 
015 * @author WB
016 * @version 2022/08/01
017 */
018public class MinErrorThresholder implements GlobalThresholder {
019        
020        static final double EPSILON = 1E-12;
021        
022        private double[] S2_0, S2_1;
023        private int N;
024        
025        public MinErrorThresholder() {
026                super();
027        }
028        
029        @Override
030        public int getThreshold(int[] h) {
031                int K = h.length;
032                makeSigmaTables(h);     // set up S2_0, S2_1, N
033
034                int n0 = 0, n1;
035                int qMin = -1;
036                double eMin = Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY;
037                for (int q = 0; q <= K-2; q++) {
038                        n0 = n0 + h[q];
039                        n1 = N - n0;
040                        if (n0 > 0 && n1 > 0) { 
041                                double P0 = (double) n0 / N;    // could use n0, n1 instead
042                                double P1 = (double) n1 / N;
043                                double e = // 1.0 + 
044                                        P0 * Math.log(S2_0[q]) + P1 * Math.log(S2_1[q])
045                                        - 2 * (P0 * Math.log(P0) + P1 * Math.log(P1));
046                                if (e < eMin) {         // minimize e;
047                                        eMin = e;
048                                        qMin = q;
049                                }
050                        }
051                }
052                return qMin; 
053        }
054        
055        private void makeSigmaTables(int[] h) {
056                int K = h.length;
057                final double unitVar = 1d/12;   // variance of a uniform distribution in unit interval
058                S2_0 = new double[K];
059                S2_1 = new double[K];
060                
061                int n0 = 0;
062                long A0 = 0;
063                long B0 = 0; 
064                for (int q = 0; q < K; q++) {
065                        long ql = q;    // need a long type to avoid overflows
066                        n0 = n0 + h[q];
067                        A0 = A0 + h[q] * ql;
068                        B0 = B0 + h[q] * ql*ql;
069                        S2_0[q] = (n0 > 0) ? 
070                                        unitVar + ((double)B0 - (double)A0*A0/n0)/n0 : 0;       
071                }
072                
073                N = n0;
074                
075                int n1 = 0;
076                long A1 = 0;
077                long B1 = 0; 
078                S2_1[K-1] = 0;
079                for (int q = K-2; q >= 0; q--) {
080                        long qp1 = q+1;
081                        n1 = n1 + h[q+1];
082                        A1 = A1 + h[q+1] * qp1;
083                        B1 = B1 + h[q+1] * qp1*qp1;
084                        S2_1[q] = (n1 > 0) ? 
085                                        unitVar + ((double)B1 - (double)A1*A1/n1)/n1 : 0;
086                }
087        }
088        
089}
